description: A collection of all app and platform metrics for vLLM instances.

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by (container)

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

ceil(sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

targets.legendFormat: RX Pod: {{exported_pod}} -  Node: {{Hostname}} - GPI: {{gpu}} - Bus ID: {{pci_bus_id}}
TX Pod: {{exported_pod}} -  Node: {{Hostname}} - GPI: {{gpu}} - Bus ID: {{pci_bus_id}}

title: vLLM Monitoring
